current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize the use of United States Armed Forces against the Islamic State in Iraq and the
			 Levant.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Authorization for Use of Military Force against the Islamic State in Iraq and the Levant
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Authorization for Use of Military Force against the Islamic State in Iraq and the Levant

text.#text: This joint resolution may be cited as the

header.#text:
Authorization for use of United States Armed Forces against the Islamic State in Iraq and the
			 Levant

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is authorized to use appropriate force against the Islamic State in Iraq and the
			 Levant (ISIL) in order to prevent terrorist attacks on the people and
			 interests of the United States and our allies.

text.#text:
The authorization in this section does not include authorization for the use of rotational ground
			 forces.

header.#text: No authorization for use of rotational ground forces

text.#text:
The authorization in this section shall expire on the date that is three years after the date of
			 the enactment of this joint resolution.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 8(a)(1) of the War Powers Resolution

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
declares that this
			 section is intended to constitute specific statutory authorization within
			 the meaning of

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 5(b) of the War Powers Resolution

text.#text: Nothing in this resolution supercedes any requirement of the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SJ 42 IS: Authorization for Use of Military Force against the Islamic State in Iraq and the Levant

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
